products.name: Artificer General Nemo & Storm Chaser Adept Caitlin Finch

feat.name: Eye Of The Storm
feat.description: When a friendly Faction model makes an electrical damage roll against an enemy model in Nemo’s control range, add an additional die to the damage roll. Eye of the Storm lasts for one turn.

execution.name: EMF Mechanics
execution.description: This model gains Blast Resistance

ability.name: Lightning Generator
ability.description: When a model is directly hit with a basic attack made with this weapon, lightning arcs from the model hit to d3 consecutive additional models unless that model has Resistance: Electric. The lightning arcs to the nearest model it has not already arced to within 4" of the last model it arced to ignoring models with Resistance: Electric ignoring this model. Each model the lightning arcs to suffers an unboostable POW 10 Electric damage roll. Lightning arc damage rolls are not considered to have been caused by an attack. Resolve lightning arc damage rolls simultaneously with the damage resulting from the attack that cause the lighting to arc.

spells.name: Chain Lightning
spells.description: A model hit by Chain Lightning suffers a POW 10 electrical damage roll, and lightning arcs from the model hit to d3 consecutive additional models unless that model has resistance: electricity. The lightning arcs to the nearest model it has not already arced to within 4" of the last model it arced to ignoring models with resistance: electricity ignoring this model. Each model the lightning arcs to suffers an unboostable POW 10 electrical damage roll. Lightning arc damage rolls are not considered to have been caused by an attack. Chain Lightning damage rolls are simultaneous.

spells.name: Electrify
spells.description: Target friendly Faction model/unit gains +2 ARM and Repulsor Field. Models are not affected while out of formation. (When a model with Repulsor Field is hit with a melee attack, after the attack is resolved the attacking model is pushed 1" directly away from the model hit.).

spells.name: Force Hammer
spells.description: Instead of suffering a normal damage roll, a non-Incorporeal model Force Hammer hits is slammed d6" directly away from the spell's point of origin and suffers a POW 12 damage roll. Collateral damage from this slam is POW 12.

spells.name: Lightning Shroud
spells.description: Target warjack in the spellcaster's battlegroup gains +2 to Melee Damage rolls and Resistance: Electricity, and its melee weapons gain Electro Leap. (When a model is hit by a basic attack made with a weapon with Electro Leap, you can have lightning arc to the nearest model within 4" of the model hit, ignoring the attacking model and any model with Resistance: electricity. The model the lightning arcs to suffers an unboostable POW 10 electrical damage roll. Lightning arc damage rolls are not considered to have been caused by an attack. Resolve lightning arc damage rolls simultaneously with the damage resulting from the attack that caused the leap.).

spells.name: Magnetic Field
spells.description: While in the spellcaster's Control Range, models in its battlegroup cannot become knocked down, cannot be warped or pushed, and cannot be moved by a slam.

characterabilities.name: Attached
characterabilities.description: Before the start of the game, attach this model to a friendly Faction leader for the rest of the game. Each Leader can have only one model/unit attached to it.

characterabilities.name: Companion [Nemo 3]
characterabilities.description: This model is included in any army that includes Nemo 3. If Nemo 3 is destroyed or removed from play, remove this model from play. This model is part of Nemo 3's battlegroup.

characterabilities.name: Fine Tuning
characterabilities.description: While this model is in formation, Nemo can upkeep one spell without spending focus.

characterabilities.name: Power Booster
characterabilities.description: When Nemo allocates 1 or more focus to a warjack in this model's CMD range, the warjack generates 1 additional focus point.

characterabilities.name: Acrobatics
characterabilities.description: This model can advance through other models if it has enough movement to move completely past their bases. This model ignores intervening models when declaring its charge target.

characterabilities.name: Dodge
characterabilities.description: This model can advance up to 2" immediately after an enemy attack that missed it is resolved unless it was missed while advancing. It cannot be targeted by free strikes during this movement.

characterabilities.name: Flames in the Darkness
characterabilities.description: This model can be included in a Religion of the Twins army. If it is, it becomes a Religion of the Twins model and not a [Cygnar] model. If included in a Religion of the Twins army, you may include up to 2 Cygnar or Khador Non-Character warjacks in this model's battlegroup.

characterabilities.name: Sprint
characterabilities.description: At the end of an activation in which it destroyed or removed from play one or more enemy models with melee attacks, this model can immediately make a full advance, then it's activation ends.

feat.name: Powerhouse
feat.description: While in Jakes' control range, friendly Faction warjacks gains +2 to melee accuracy and melee damage rolls. While within 3" of the affected warjack, friendly Faction non-warjack models gain +2 on melee accuracy and melee damage rolls. Powerhouse lasts for one turn.

execution.name: Medallion of Ascendant Rowan
execution.description: The first time each turn this model would be the target of an enemy spell or upkeep, increase the cost of that spell or upkeep by 1.

ability.name: Reload [1]
ability.description: This model can spend up to 1 focus, fury, or essensce to make one additional ranged attack with this weapon during its Combat Action per focus, fury, or essence spent.

ability.name: Feedback
ability.description: If this weapon damages a warjack that is part of a battlegroup, the warjack's controller suffers 1 damage point.

ability.name: Electro Leap
ability.description: When a model is hit by a basic attack made with this weapon, you can have lightning arc to the nearest model within 4" of the model hit, ignoring the attacking model and any model with Resistance: Electric. The model the lightning arcs to suffers an unboostable POW 10 Electric damage roll. Lightning arc damage rolls are not considered to have been caused by an attack. Resolve lightning arc damage rolls simultaneously with the damage resulting from the attack that caused the leap.

spells.name: Bulwark
spells.description: While in the spellcaster's Control Range, and B2B with one or more models in its battlegroup, models in the spellcaster's battlegroup gain +2 DEF and cannot become knocked down.

spells.name: Dash
spells.description: The spellcaster and friendly Faction warrior models activating in its Control Range gain +1 SPD. While in the spellcaster's Control Range, friendly Faction warrior models gain Unstoppable. Dash lasts for one turn.

spells.name: Electrical Blast
spells.description: Electrical Blast causes electrical damage. Warjacks damaged by Electrical Blast suffer Disruption.

spells.name: Lightning Tendrils
spells.description: Target friendly Faction model/unit gains Resistance: Electricity. Affected models' melee weapons become RNG 2 and gain Electro Leap. Models are not affected while out of formation.

characterabilities.name: True Sight
characterabilities.description: This model ignores cloud effects when determining LOS. This model also ignores Stealth.

feat.name: Overkill
feat.description: After resolving each ranged attack that hits an enemy model, Captain Allister Caine gains a cumulative +1 to his Spellstorm Pistol attack damage rolls. When a model is boxed by a Spellstorm Pistol attack, center a 3" AOE on it and remove it from play. Models in the AOE are hit and suffer an unboostable POW 10 blast damage roll. Overkill expires at the end of Caine's activation.

execution.name: Prowl
execution.description: While this model has concealment, it gains Stealth.

ability.name: Chain Attack: Grievous Wounds
ability.description: If this model hits the same model with both of it's initial attacks with this weapon, the model hit loses Tough and cannot have damage removed from it for one round.

ability.name: Reload [Infinite]
ability.description: This model can spend up to Infinite focus, fury, or essensce to make one additional ranged attack with this weapon during its Combat Action per focus, fury, or essence spent.

ability.name: Trick Shot [Initial Attack Only]
ability.description: If this attack directly hits, choose another model within 4" of the model hit. The chosen model suffers an unboostable POW 10 Arcane damage roll. The point of origin for this damage is the model hit. Trick Shot damage rolls are not considered to have been caused by an attack.

topability.name: Attack Type
topability.description: Each time this weapon is used to make an attack, choose one of the following special rules:

subabilities.name: Black Penny
subabilities.description: This attack ignores the target in melee DEF bonus.

subabilities.name: Heart Seeker
subabilities.description: Gain an additional die on damage rolls resulting from this attack. Discard the lowest die in each roll.

subabilities.name: Ward Breaker
subabilities.description: When resolving this attack, this weapon gains Blessed.

spells.name: Bullet Dodger
spells.description: Target friendly Faction model gains +2 DEF and Dodge. (A model with Dodge can advance up to 2" immediately after an enemy attack that missed it is resolved unless it was missed while advancing. It cannot be targeted by free strikes during this movement.).

spells.name: Fire For Effect
spells.description: Boost the attack and damage rolls of target friendly Faction model's first ranged attack each activation.

spells.name: Gate Crasher
spells.description: Warp the spellcaster anywhere completely within 5" of its current location. After casting Gate Crasher, for the rest of this activation the spellcaster cannot advance and its ranged attacks must target models in its melee range. Gate Crasher can be cast only once per activation.

spells.name: Heighten Reflexes
spells.description: Target friendly Faction model/unit cannot become knocked down or stationary. Models are not affected while out of formation.

characterabilities.name: Defense Formation
characterabilities.description: Models in this model's battlegroup that are currently in this model's control range and are B2B with one or more models in this model's battlegroup gain +2 ARM and cannot become knocked down.

characterabilities.name: Polarity Field
characterabilities.description: This model cannot be targeted by a charge or slam power attack made by a model beginning the charge or slam in it's front arc.

characterabilities.name: Spell Rack [2]
characterabilities.description: This model may select a number of spells from its faction spell pool according to its designated spell rack number. This model gains these spells in addition to the spells that are already on its card. A model may not have two identical spells on its spell card. When making spell selections from the spell pool deduct the spells COST from this model's available Battlegroup Points unless the spell entry lists another cost.

characterabilities.name: Split Loyalties [Ord] [Cygnar]
characterabilities.description: When included in a Ord army, DiBaro 1 is a Ord model and not a Cygnar model. When included in a Cygnar army, DiBaro 1 is a Cygnar model and not a Ord model.

feat.name: Weathering The Storm
feat.description: While in Captain Athena di Baro's control range, models gain one additional dice on their accuracy rolls and damage rolls. When resolving a friendly model's roll. Discard the lowest die rolled. When resolving an enemy model's roll, discard the highest die rolled. Weathering the Storm lasts for one round.

execution.name: Groundwork
execution.description: While knocked down, this model is not automatically hit by melee attacks, and its DEF is not reduced by being knocked down.

ability.name: Critical Cortex Damage
ability.description: On a critical hit on a warjack, the warjack suffers 1 damage point to its first available cortex system box.

spells.name: Hallowed Avenger
spells.description: Target friendly Faction Cohort model gains Righteous Vengeance. (If one or more friendly Faction warrior models were destroyed or removed from play by enemy attacks while within 5" of a model with Righteous Vengeance during the last round, during your Maintenance Phase the model with Righteous Vengeance can advance up to 3" and make one basic attack.).

spells.name: Open Fire
spells.description: Target Cohort model in this model's battlegroup that is in its Control Range can immediately make one basic ranged attack. A model can be targeted by open fire only once per turn.

characterabilities.name: Activate Halfjack
characterabilities.description: At the end of your Control Phase, you can put one Halfjack Solo into play within 1" of this model if there are fewer than three Halfjacks in play in Darius' battlegroup.

characterabilities.name: Crane
characterabilities.description: Once per turn at any time during its activation, this model can choose one other friendly large-based or smaller model within 2" of it. You can place that model anywhere completely within 2" of its current location, and if it is knocked down, it immediately stands up.

characterabilities.name: Repair [d3+3] (★Action)
characterabilities.description: RNG 1". Target friendly Faction construct model. If the model is in range, remove d3+3 damage point from it.

characterabilities.name: Repairable
characterabilities.description: This model can be targeted with Repair special actions as if it were a construct model.

feat.name: Pitstop
feat.description: Captain E. Dominic Darious gains 3 focus points, then remove all damage from friendly warjacks within 1' of Darius or a Halfjack in his battlegroup. Additionally, warjacks currently within 1" of Darius or a Halfjack in his battlegroup gain +2 SPD, MAT and RAT for one turn.

execution.name: Field Marshal [Dodge]
execution.description: Cohort models in this model's battlegroup gain Dodge. (A model with Dodge can advance up to 2" immediately after an enemy attack that missed it is resolved unless it was missed while advancing. It cannot be targeted by free strikes during this movement.)

ability.name: Steam Pressure
ability.description: If this model uses it's Normal Movement to aim, this weapon gains +4 RNG that activation.

ability.name: Critical Knockdown
ability.description: On a critical hit, the model hit becomes knocked down.

ability.name: Tremor (★Attack)
ability.description: This attack causes no damage.  Other models within 2" of this model become knocked down. This model is not affected by Tremor.

spells.name: Arcantrik Bolt
spells.description: A warjack damaged by this attack becomes stationary for one round.

spells.name: Fortify
spells.description: Target model in the spellcaster's battlegroup gains +2 ARM. That model and any friendly model B2B with it cannot become knocked down, be pushed, or moved by a slam.

spells.name: Full Throttle
spells.description: Warjacks in the spellcaster's battlegroup beginning their activations in its Control Range can run, charge, or make slam or trample power attacks without spending focus that activation. While in the spellcaster's Control Range, models in its battlegroup gain boosted melee attack rolls. Full Throttle lasts for one turn.

spells.name: Jackhammer
spells.description: Target model in the spellcaster's battlegroup immediately makes one basic melee attack.

spells.name: Refuge
spells.description: At the end of an activation in which target friendly Faction model hit an enemy model with an attack, the affected model can make a full advance.

characterabilities.name: Companion [Captain E. Dominic Darius]
characterabilities.description: This model is included in any army that includes Captain E. Dominic Darius. If Captain E. Dominic Darius is destroyed or removed from play, remove this model from play. This model is part of Captain E. Dominic Darius's battlegroup.

characterabilities.name: Prime Mine (★Action)
characterabilities.description: Replace this model with a small based mine marker. You can have up to three mine markers in play at any time. After resolving continuous effects during your Maintenance Phase, you can detonate any number of friendly mine markers. Models within 3" of a mine marker suffer an unboostable POW 14 blast damage roll, then the mine marker is removed from the table. The mine marker is not a model.

characterabilities.name: Repair [1] (★Action)
characterabilities.description: RNG 1". Target friendly Faction construct model. If the model is in range, remove 1 damage point from it.

characterabilities.name: Iron Horse
characterabilities.description: Light and heavy warjacks in this model's battlegroup gain Cavalry, Pathfinder and Reposition [5"]. When an affected warjack makes an impact attack, that attack has a base POW equal to its STR. The melee range of impact attacks is 1". Affected warjacks do not gain Mount attacks from Iron Horse

characterabilities.name: Reposition [5"]
characterabilities.description: At the end of an activation in which it did not run or fail a charge, this model can advance up to 5", then it's activation ends.

characterabilities.name: Steady
characterabilities.description: This model cannot become knocked down.

feat.name: Shadow War
feat.description: When one or more enemy models are destroyed by an attack while in Kraye's control range, immediately after the attack is resolved, one model in Kraye's battlegroup currently in it's control range gains 1 focus point. Additionally, while in Kraye's control range, models in his battlegroup gain Stealth. Shadow war lasts for one round.

execution.name: Leadership [Rangers]
execution.description: Friendly Ranger models in this model’s CMD range’s weapons gain Beacon and Flare. (Friendly Faction models can charge or make a slam power attack against an enemy model hit by a weapon with Beacon without being forced or spending focus. A friendly Faction model charging an enemy model hit by Beacon gains +2” movement. Beacon lasts for one turn.) (Models hit by a weapon with Flare lose and cannot gain Stealth and suffer -2 DEF for one turn.)

ability.name: Brutal Charge
ability.description: This model gains +2 to charge attack damage rolls with this weapon.

spells.name: Admonition
spells.description: When an enemy model advances and ends its movement or is warped within 6" of target model in this spellcaster's battlegroup, the affected model can immediately advance up to 3", then Admonition expires.

spells.name: Countermeasure
spells.description: While within 5" of target friendly Faction model/unit, enemy models cannot make ranged attacks.

spells.name: Horsepower
spells.description: Warjacks in the spellcaster's battlegroup currently in its Control Range gain +3" movement when they charge or make a slam power attack. Horsepower lasts for one turn.

spells.name: Jumpstart
spells.description: Models in the spellcaster's battlegroup that are currently in its Control Range stand up and are no longer stationary.  Affected models can turn to face any direction. Models that were knocked down this turn are not affected by Jumpstart.

spells.name: Lock The Target
spells.description: A model damaged by Lock the Target cannot run, charge, or make slam or trample power attacks for one round.

characterabilities.name: Field Marshal [True Sight]
characterabilities.description: Cohort models in this model's battlegroup gain True Sight. ()

characterabilities.name: Heart of Darkness [Cygnar]
characterabilities.description: This model can be included in an Infernals army. If it is, it becomes an Infernal model and not a Cygnar model. If included in an Infernals army, any non-partisan, non-character Cygnar Cohort can also be included in this model's battlegroup and they gain Accumulator [Soulless].  Additionally, you may include 2 non-partisan, non-character Cygnar units and 3 non-partisan, non-Archon, non-character Cygnar Solos as well.

ability.name: Electro Leap

characterabilities.name: Order: Suppressing Fire
characterabilities.description: This order can be issued only if two or more models with ranged weapons in this unit in formation are able to forfeit their Combat Actions. Each model in this unit in formation must forfeit its action. Place an AOE completely within the weapon RNG of all participants, with its center point in LOS of all participants, ignoring intervening models. The size of the AOE is based on the number of participants. If there are 2-4, the AOE is 3". If there are 5-7, the AOE is 4". If there are 8 or more, the AOE is 5". When a model enters or ends its activation within the AOE, it suffers a POW 10 damage roll. Suppressing Fire lasts for one round or until all participants have been destroyed or removed from play.

ability.description: On a critical hit on a warjack, the warjack suffers Disruption, A warjack suffering Disruption loses its focus points and cannot channel spells or gains focus by any means, including by being allocated focus, for one round.

ability.name: Lightning Generator
ability.description: When a model is directly hit with a basic attack made with this weapon, lightning arcs from the model hit to d3 consecutive additional models unless that model has Resistance: Electric. The lightning arcs to the nearest model it has not already arced to within 4" of the last model it arced to ignoring models with Resistance: Electric ignoring this model. Each model the lightning arcs to suffers an unboostable POW 10 Electric damage roll. Lightning arc damage rolls are not considered to have been caused by an attack. Resolve lightning arc damage rolls simultaneously with the damage resulting from the attack that cause the lighting to arc.

Returned Grunts must forfeit their combat actions the turn they are returned to play.

characterabilities.name: Trench Network

These trench terrain features must be placed either in base contact with this model or in contact with a trench terrain feature that is in base contact with this model. These trench terrain features cannot be placed in contact with a non-trench terrain feature.
